resources.string:
Canadians are often faced with a challenge with nutrition and diet; some of which have even turned to mobile apps for help. We wanted to create an app that promotes healthy eating for those individualsâ€”a more modernized method to communicate amongst users with dietary guidance. The main idea behind the app is to help those that struggle with identifying what a healthy meal is or making meal choices in general. It gives Canadians easy access to healthy eating information. The Nutrition Freak app allows you to create an easy-to-use customized meal plan for you and your family,based on age, and sex.






Created by:
Cesar Satana
Jeremey Klotz
Rebecca Tran
Hahd Khan
